channel.title: How to make grass white (317)?
channel.description:
I have the snow flakes falling, but how do i make it so all grass is white?? please help. I want to add for christmas.. Also i have a santa and when you talk to him, he is supposed to say "Merry Christmas! Have a sled for Free!" buut only admins+ can talk to him.. please help..
Btw this is on a delta based client... if thats any help

Snow cache. ii claw ii’s client has it.
